welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Milford, a charming city known for its scenic beauty and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our quaint streets, indulge in delicious cuisine, and make unforgettable memories during your stay. Enjoy your time in Milford!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport is used for shipping and receiving of goods and materials.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Haven Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New Haven Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and houses the airport's amenities such as dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves private and charter flights and offers a comfortable waiting area for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport houses the check-in counters, security checkpoints, and boarding gates for all flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport is reserved for private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
